News & Events

We Learn As One

Western Mindanao State University joins the Commission on Higher Education (CHED) as it turns 26 this year, commemorating its Anniversary since its creation in 1994. The higher education landscape has rapidly changed since then and is continuously transforming especially during the COVID-19 pandemic...

READ MORE

Congratulations Dr. Ma. Carla A. Ochotorena

The Board of Regents, the university’s highest decision-making body, elected Dr. Ochotorena as its 6th president in a special meeting held September 2. A holder of Doctor of Philosophy in Public Administration and Governance degree from the University of the Visayas, Dr. Ochotorena served as WMSU’s Vice President for Academic Affairs (VPAA)...

READ MORE

Additional 400 KW Solar Energy to power WMSU Facilities

The Western Mindanao State University (WMSU) yet again showed how serious the university is towards being a more eco-friendly and sustainable university. WMSU officially launched the additional 400 Kilowatts (KW) renewable Energy Solar Facility last November 27, 2019 at Dr. Bruno Juanitoa Gymnasium.
